ABOUT.TEXT:
I'm an active person. And I always can find what to do. I like to try new and new things.
My main hobby is tourism in all kind of it: hicking, biking and kayaking; by forests, lakes, rivers, and mountains; from taking part in multisport adventure races to lying on the hot beaches; from hitchhiking through Asian countries to transfer on comfortable buses and planes; from -35 to 45 degrees.
I have a big list of my sporting, dancing and other courses that I have done.

EXPECTATION:
I like clear described issues. The tasks become interesting when you understand ideas and importance what are you doing.
Also, for me is necessary to have a friendly and kind atmosphere in a team; communication and development. Sometimes, the possibility of flexible graphics and remote work.
I prefer the work-life-balanced day to have time to realize all sides of my interests.
